data.title: Hotels in Glasgow City Centre
data.meta_description: Book your stay at one of the finest Glasgow Hotels. Sited in the city centre, Leonardo Hotel is close to three major stations, making it the ideal choice.
data.text:
With over three hundred comfortable, stylish guestrooms, a state of the art gym and new executive lounge, Leonardo Royal Hotel Glasgow has everything you need for an enjoyable stay in Scotland’s second city. Whether you’re visiting Glasgow for business or pleasure, our hotel and facilities are sure to leave you feeling refreshed and rejuvenated.

Discover more about booking a city break in Glasgow, or if you are looking for hotels a bit outside the city centre then take a look at some of our hotels near Glasgow Airport.

Where are we?

Situated on Jamaica Street, our four-star Leonardo Royal Hotel in Glasgow is within a ten-minute walk of the city’s three major railway stations, Glasgow Central, Queen Street and Argyle Street, making it the ideal hotel for guests traveling by rail.

It’s an easy three-minute train ride (or 20-minute walk) to the Scottish Exhibition and Conference Centre and The Hydro Entertainment Arena, so Leonardo Royal Hotel Glasgow is perfectly placed for both business and leisure guests.

Our four-star Glasgow hotel is just a stone’s throw from a plethora of excellent restaurants and bars and just around the corner from Alston Bar & Beef, which boasts some of the best steak and gin in the city. We're also situated right near St Enoch shopping centre so you can see whatshopping in Glasgow has to offer.

What you’ll find at Leonardo Royal Hotel Glasgow

Your Room at Leonardo Royal Hotel Glasgow

Leonardo Royal Hotel Glasgow has 321 bedrooms newly designed bedrooms comprising of deluxe, executive and

junior suites. Bedrooms feature a beautiful botanical-themed décor, with a nod to the city’s motto, “Let Glasgow Flourish”, which is found on Glasgow’s historic coat of armsl. More spacious than you’d expect, rooms can accommodate three adults or two adults with two children under twelve, or just one guest. The spacious feel is clearly designed around our guests’ comfort.

Free WiFi

49 inch televisions with Chromecast

Air-con

Room service available 24 hours

Luxurious White Company toiletries

Espresso machine

Premium teas and biscuit

Spacious work area

Selection of pillows available for your comfort

Guests staying in the Executive rooms and Junior Suites also enjoy access to the Executive Lounge. Offering the perfect place to relax, the Executive Lounge provides guests with complimentary refreshments and snacks. If we don't have any rooms available, why not check the availability at Leonardo Inn Hotel Glasgow West End?

Accessible wheelchair friendly rooms

A number of our bedrooms have been designed for guests with mobility disabilities and are available on request. In room features include:

Lowered beds for easy transfer from a wheelchair to the bed

Wide bedroom & bathroom doors

Emergency Cords

Sufficient floor space to manoeuvre

Fully accessible bathrooms, including roll-in showers with additional handrails, lower sinks, lower towel rail, grab rails, shower seat and emergency cord

Lowered sockets, switches and clothes rail

Throughout Leonardo Royal Hotel Glasgow, additional features include:

A fully accessible toilet in the public area including grab rails, lower sink and emergency cord.

Click here to view ourAccess Statement.

Food and drink

The brand new Leo's bar and restaurant with stylish new interiors offers an extensive menu with lite bites, main courses and desserts, and for our younger guests we also provide a kids menu.

Enjoy a rich coffee or delicious hot chocolate from our on-site coffee bar, where you can sit with a newspaper, curl up with a good book, or surf the web on Leonardo Hotels free WiFi.

Room service is available. Full details can be found on the room service menu in your hotel room.

Leisure

The new state of the art gym at Leonardo Royal Hotel Glasgow offers guests the chance to unwind after a long day. With new high tech fitness equipment, including Peloton bikes, guests can enjoy a workout during their stay.

Business guests

If you are a visiting Glasgow on business, we have 10 fully equipped meeting rooms and can accommodate up to 110 guests. Our business packages offer tea and coffee refreshments, lunch options, and dedicated event staff on-hand to ensure your meeting runs as smoothly as possible.

So, whether you’re planning a meeting, training session or sales presentation, Leonardo Meetings are perfectly tailored to your business needs.

If you happen to be travelling to Scotland’s capital on business, check out our Edinburgh hotel, which has five meeting rooms and can accommodate up to 50 guests.
